Title: Fallout
Plot: Green and Cassady get mixed up with the Russian consulate after Peter Rostov dies of ricin poisoning. Their investigation leads them first to his work, where they learn he spent a great deal of time traveling back and forth between Russia, and secondly to his brother, Karl. It isn't long before they link the Rostov brothers to an illegal prostitution ring trafficking in young Russian woman, but McCoy is faced with trying to get the remaining Rostov brother to testify so he can prosecute Brezin,
GuestStars: Jim Iorio, Jane Stiles, Matt Pepper, Sayra Player, Margarita Malayeva, Billie Jean King, Dylan Chalfy, Matthew Conlon, Lawrence Winslow, Rachel Fowler, Christopher LaPanta, Shaun Kevlin, Michael Kaplan, Clark Car
